get.summary: Get current logged-in user endpoint (administrator, coordinator, typist)

200.description: The current user name and id

put.summary: Update the user's account with a new password and optionally new fullname (administrator, coordinator, typist)

get.summary:
Get a list of all elections, without their candidate lists and
a list of the current committee session for each election (administrator, coordinator, typist)

post.summary: Uploads election definition, validates it, saves it to the database, and returns the created election (administrator)

Uploads election definition, validates it and returns the associated election data and
a redacted hash, to be filled by the administrator. (administrator)

get.summary:
Get election details including the election's candidate list (political groups),
its polling stations and the current committee session and its investigations (administrator, coordinator, typist)
Download a generated PDF with election results (coordinator)
Download a zip containing a PDF for the PV and the EML with election results (coordinator)
Get a list of all [Investigation]s for a committee session (coordinator)
administrator, coordinator
administrator, coordinator
administrator, coordinator
Get a list of all [PollingStation]s for an election (administrator, coordinator, typist)

post.summary: Import file with Polling Stations (administrator, coordinator)
Validate a file with Polling Stations (administrator, coordinator)

get.summary: Get a [PollingStation] (administrator, coordinator, typist)
Get election polling stations data entry statuses (administrator, coordinator, typist)

put.summary: Change the number of voters of an [Election]. (administrator, coordinator)

204.description: Election number of voters changed successfully

403.description: Forbidden, the application is already initialised

post.summary: Create the first admin user, only allowed if no users exist yet

403.description: Forbidden, an active user already exists

get.summary: Check whether the application is initialised (an admin user exists + has logged in at least once)
List audit events (administrator, coordinator)

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Only show events since the specified timestamp

get.summary: Lists all users that appear in the audit log (administrator, coordinator)

200.description: Audit log list of all users

post.summary: Login endpoint, authenticates a user and creates a new session + session cookie

200.description: The logged in user id and user name

post.summary: Logout endpoint, deletes the session cookie

204.description: Successful logout, or user was already logged out

delete.summary: Delete data entries and result for a polling station (coordinator)

get.summary: Get data entry with validation results (coordinator)
Get data entry differences to be resolved (coordinator)

200.description: Data entry differences to be resolved

404.description: No data entry with differences found

post.summary: Resolve data entry differences by providing a `ResolveDifferencesAction` (coordinator)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

post.summary: Resolve accepted data entry errors by providing a `ResolveErrorsAction` (coordinator)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

post.summary: Finalise the data entry for a polling station (typist)

parameters.name: entry_number
parameters.description: Data entry number (first or second data entry)

422.description: JSON error or invalid data (Unprocessable Content)

post.summary: Create an investigation for a polling station (coordinator)

CSOFirstSessionResults.description:
CSOFirstSessionResults, following the fields in Model Na 31-2 Bijlage 2.

See "Model Na 31-2. Proces-verbaal van een gemeentelijk stembureau/stembureau voor het openbaar
lichaam in een gemeente/openbaar lichaam waar een centrale stemopneming wordt verricht,
Bijlage 2: uitkomsten per stembureau" from the
[Kiesregeling](https://wetten.overheid.nl/BWBR0034180/2024-04-01#Bijlage1_DivisieNa31.2) or
[Verkiezingstoolbox](https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/onderwerpen/verkiezingen/verkiezingentoolkit/modellen).

counting_differences_polling_station.description: Counting Differences Polling Station ("B1-2 Verschillen met telresultaten van het stembureau")

differences_counts.description: Differences counts ("3. Verschil tussen het aantal toegelaten kiezers en het aantal getelde stembiljetten")

extra_investigation.description: Extra investigation ("B1-1 Alleen bij extra onderzoek")

political_group_votes.description: Vote counts per list and candidate (5. "Aantal stemmen per lijst en kandidaat")

CSONextSessionResults.description:
CSONextSessionResults, following the fields in Model Na 14-2 Bijlage 1.

See "Model Na 14-2. Corrigendum bij het proces-verbaal van een gemeentelijk stembureau/
stembureau voor het openbaar lichaam, Bijlage 1: uitkomsten per stembureau" from the
[Kiesregeling](https://wetten.overheid.nl/BWBR0034180/2024-04-01#Bijlage1_DivisieNa14.2) or
[Verkiezingstoolbox](https://www.rijksoverheid.nl/onderwerpen/verkiezingen/verkiezingentoolkit/modellen).

differences_counts.description: Differences counts ("Verschil tussen het aantal toegelaten kiezers en het aantal getelde stembiljetten")

political_group_votes.description: Vote counts per list and candidate ("Aantal stemmen per lijst en kandidaat")

ClaimDataEntryResponse.description: Response structure for getting data entry of polling station results

CommonPollingStationResults.description: CommonPollingStationResults contains the common fields for polling station results,

differences_counts.description: Differences counts ("Verschil tussen het aantal toegelaten kiezers en het aantal getelde stembiljetten")

political_group_votes.description: Vote counts per list and candidate ("Aantal stemmen per lijst en kandidaat")

CountingDifferencesPollingStation.description:
Counting Differences Polling Station,
part of the polling station results ("B1-2 Verschillen met telresultaten van het stembureau")

difference_ballots_per_list.description:
Whether there was a difference between the total votes per list as determined by the polling station and by the typist
("Is er een verschil tussen het totaal aantal getelde stembiljetten per lijst zoals eerder vastgesteld door het stembureau en zoals door u geteld op het gemeentelijk stembureau?")

unexplained_difference_ballots_voters.description:
Whether there was an unexplained difference between the number of voters and votes
("Was er in de telresultaten van het stembureau een onverklaard verschil tussen het totaal aantal getelde stembiljetten en het aantal toegelaten kiezers?")

CreateUserRequest.description: Struct used to create a new user

DataEntry.description: Request structure for saving data entry of polling station results

client_state.description: Client state for the data entry (arbitrary JSON)

data.description: Data entry for a polling station

DifferenceCountsCompareVotesCastAdmitted.description: Compare votes cast admitted voters, part of the differences counts.

admitted_voters_equal_votes_cast.description:
Whether total of admitted voters and total of votes cast match.
("D en H zijn gelijk")

votes_cast_greater_than_admitted_voters.description:
Whether total of admitted voters is greater than total of votes cast match.
("H is groter dan D (meer uitgebrachte stemmen dan toegelaten kiezers)")

votes_cast_smaller_than_admitted_voters.description:
Whether total of admitted voters is less than total of votes cast match.
("H is kleiner dan D (minder uitgebrachte stemmen dan toegelaten kiezers)")

DifferencesCounts.description:
Differences counts, part of the polling station results.
(B1-3.3 "Verschillen tussen aantal kiezers en uitgebrachte stemmen")

compare_votes_cast_admitted_voters.description:
Whether total of admitted voters and total of votes cast match.
(B1-3.3.1 "Vergelijk D (totaal toegelaten kiezers) en H (totaal uitgebrachte stemmen)")

difference_completely_accounted_for.description:
Whether the difference between the total of admitted voters and total of votes cast is explained.
(B1-3.3.2 "Zijn er tijdens de stemming dingen opgeschreven die het verschil tussen D en H volledig verklaren?")

fewer_ballots_count.description: Number of fewer counted ballots ("Aantal minder getelde stemmen (bereken: D min H)")

more_ballots_count.description: Number of more counted ballots ("Aantal mr getelde stemmen (bereken: H min D)")

ElectionDetailsResponse.description:
Election details response, including the election's candidate list (political groups),
its polling stations and its committee sessions and current committee session

ElectionListResponse.description:
Election list response

Also includes a list of the current committee session for each election.
Does not include the candidate list (political groups) to keep the response size small.

ElectionNumberOfVotersChangeRequest.description: Election number of voters change request

ElectionStatusResponse.description: Election polling stations data entry statuses response

ElectionStatusResponseEntry.description: Election polling stations data entry statuses response

finalised_with_warnings.description: Whether the finalised first or second data entry has warnings

finished_at.description: Time when the data entry was finalised

first_entry_progress.description: First entry progress as a percentage (0 to 100)

second_entry_progress.description: Second entry progress as a percentage (0 to 100)

ErrorReference.description: Error reference used to show the corresponding error message to the end-user

ExtraInvestigation.description: Extra investigation, part of the polling station results ("B1-1 Alleen bij extra onderzoek")

ballots_recounted_extra_investigation.description:
Whether ballots were (partially) recounted following the extra investigation
("Zijn de stembiljetten naar aanleiding van het extra onderzoek (gedeeltelijk) herteld?")

extra_investigation_other_reason.description:
Whether extra investigation was done for another reason than an unexplained difference
("Heeft het gemeentelijk stembureau extra onderzoek gedaan vanwege een andere reden dan een onverklaard verschil?")

first_data_entry.description: Percentage of the first data entry to complete if data entry is included

political_groups.description: Number of political groups to create

polling_stations.description: Number of polling stations to create

seats.description: Number of seats in the election

second_data_entry.description: Percentage of the completed first data entries that also get a second data entry

turnout.description: Percentage of voters that voted (given we generate data entries)

with_data_entry.description: Include (part of) data entry for this election

allOf.description:
Results for centrally counted (CSO) elections, first election committee session.
This contains the data entry values from Model Na 31-2 Bijlage 2.

oneOf.description:
Results for centrally counted (CSO) elections, first election committee session.
This contains the data entry values from Model Na 31-2 Bijlage 2.

allOf.description:
Results for centrally counted (CSO) elections, any subsequent election committee session.
This contains the data entry values from Model Na 14-2 Bijlage 1.

oneOf.description:
Results for centrally counted (CSO) elections, any subsequent election committee session.
This contains the data entry values from Model Na 14-2 Bijlage 1.

PollingStationResults.description:
PollingStationResults contains the results for a polling station.

The exact type of results depends on the election counting method and
whether this is the first or any subsequent data entry session. Based on
this, any of four different models can apply

chunks.description: Array holding the hash chunks as text

redacted_indexes.description: Indexes of chunks that will be empty, sorted

SaveDataEntryResponse.description: Response structure for saving data entry of polling station results

User.description: User object, corresponds to a row in the users table

VotersCounts.description: Voters counts, part of the polling station results.

poll_card_count.description: Number of valid poll cards ("Aantal geldige stempassen")

proxy_certificate_count.description: Number of valid proxy certificates ("Aantal geldige volmachtbewijzen")

total_admitted_voters_count.description: Total number of admitted voters ("Totaal aantal toegelaten kiezers")

VotesCounts.description:
Votes counts, part of the polling station results.
Following the fields in Model CSO Na 31-2 Bijlage 1.

total_votes_candidates_count.description:
Total number of valid votes on candidates
("Totaal stemmen op kandidaten")

total_votes_cast_count.description: Total number of votes cast ("Totaal uitgebrachte stemmen")

YesNo.description: Yes/No response structure for boolean questions with separate yes and no fields.
